revised_title: Petrographical Analysis of the Eruptions of May 1902 at the Soufriére in St. Vincent
tldr: The author examines the petrographical aspects of the eruptions of May 1902 at the Soufriére volcano in St. Vincent, analyzing the composition and characteristics of the ejected materials, including volcanic sand, dust, and blocks. The study provides insights into the nature of the magma and the geological processes involved in the eruptions.
